data.name: Meliora - The 7 Deadly Sins ULTIMATE Pack
data.detailed_description:
ULTIMATE Pack (The 7 Deadly Sins)

( 15 Free Tickets + 1 A character Ninja + 1 S character Necromancer + 1 SS character Zix )

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 @ 3.30GHz
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 @ 3.40GHz
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
